text:
US Ryder Cup captain Keegan Bradley on the most important thing he wants to see from his team this afternoon: ‚ÄòWell, we‚Äôve just had the president fly over in his Air Force One - so I‚Äôve got a feeling that things are going to turn here.‚Äô
#RyderCup2025

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text: Called it‚Ä¶

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
US Ryder Cup captain Keegan Bradley after losing the afternoon fourballs: ‚ÄòThe boys played really good this afternoon. Europe made a lot of putts. Happy with the way we‚Äôre playing; hopefully it will turn - our putts will go in tomorrow.‚Äô
#RyderCup

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
First time in the history of the Ryder Cup that Europe has won the first three sessions in the United States. 
And in front of what sounds like the least respectful home crowd ever. 
#RyderCup

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text: American golf commentator and former professional Jay Townsend: ‚ÄòI want to say, all the Ryder Cups I‚Äôve done back to 99, this is the worst crowd behaviour I‚Äôve seen.‚Äô

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
Comprehensively beaten in all four sessions, US Ryder Cup captain Keegan Bradley grasps for another American Football analogy: ‚ÄòWell, I was at the 28-3 Super Bowl when the Patriots came back at the Falcons. I watched it. 
‚ÄòSo let‚Äôs live it tomorrow. Who knows.‚Äô
#RyderCup

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text: Sadly, it precedes the current administration.

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
Shane Lowry. 
Exceptional. 
#RyderCup

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
The United States. Their graceless captain. And their abhorrent home support got exactly what they deserved. 
#Rydercup

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
Shane Lowry: ‚ÄòThat was the hardest couple of hours in my entire life. Honestly. 
‚ÄòI said, ‚ÄòI have the chance to do the coolest thing in my life‚Ä¶‚Äô
‚ÄòThe Ryder Cup means everything to me. I won the Open in Ireland, it‚Äôs amazing, it‚Äôs a dream come true, but the Ryder Cup for me is everything.‚Äô

author: duncancastles.bsky.social
text:
First home Ryder Cup loss in 13 years. 
Europe absolutely exceptional in front of the most abhorrently disrespectful crowd ever. 
The US PGA even handed a microphone to an MC as inanely abusive as their spectators. 
#RyderCup
